name: Audify
description: Audify is a powerful Telegram Music + Management Bot powered by Python, Pyrogram, and PyTgCalls. It streams high-quality music in group voice chats, manages your community, auto-moderates, and supports Spotify, YouTube, and more â€” all in one bot.

API_ID.description: Get this from https://my.telegram.org (API Development Tools).

API_HASH.description: Get this from https://my.telegram.org (API Development Tools).

LOGGER_ID.description: Log group/chat ID where bot will send logs. Add bot as admin with full rights. (Use -100 prefix for groups).

MONGO_DB_URI.description: MongoDB connection URI (Get from https://cloud.mongodb.com or self-hosted MongoDB).

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram user ID (Owner of the bot). Use @userinfobot to find your ID.

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram v2 String Session for assistant account (Use a session generator bot or script).

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify API Client ID. Get from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard.

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify API Client Secret. Get from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard.
